mapper.select: SELECT emp_code, emp_name, emp_date emp_role, find_cdnm('0B', emp_role) AS emp_role_name, dept_code, find_cdnm('DEPT-TYPE', dept_code) AS dept_code_name, emp_tel FROM com_emp ORDER BY emp_code

SELECT e.emp_code, e.emp_name, e.emp_date e.emp_role, c.commde_name, e.emp_tel FROM com_emp e left join com_commde c on(e.dept_code = c.commde_code) WHERE emp_name LIKE '%' || #{empName} || '%' ORDER BY emp_code
